mapper.insert: INSERT INTO employees (empNum, empName, pw, job, phoneNum, annualLeaveNum,workDate,birthDate, adminNum, authNum, deptNum) VALUES (empNum_seq.NEXTVAL, #{empName},#{pw}, #{job}, #{phoneNum}, #{annualLeaveNum}, #{workDate},#{birthDate}, #{adminNum}, #{authNum}, #{deptNum})

INSERT INTO employees (leaveNum, leaveType, leaveReason, proposalDate, startDate, endDate,leaveGrantDay) VALUES (leaveNum_seq.NEXTVAL, #{empName},#{pw}, #{job}, #{phoneNum}, #{annualLeaveNum}, #{workDate},#{birthDate}, #{adminNum}, #{authNum}, #{deptNum})
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM employees WHERE TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'MMDD') = '0101' AND workDate > 365
mapper.update: UPDATE employees e SET e.annualLeaveNum = CASE WHEN e.workDate >= 365 THEN CASE WHEN e.workDate >= 730 THEN LEAST(25, (#{annualLeaveNum}+1) + FLOOR(((e.workDate - 730) / 365)) + LEAST(1, FLOOR(((e.workDate - 730) / 365)))) ELSE LEAST(#{annualLeaveNum}, #{annualLeaveNum} + FLOOR(((e.workDate - 365) / 365)) + LEAST(1, FLOOR(((e.workDate - 365) / 365)))) END ELSE CASE WHEN TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'MMDD') = #{leaveGrantDay} THEN 15 ELSE FLOOR(months_between(SYSDATE, e.hireDate)) END END WHERE e.empNum IN ( SELECT e2.empNum FROM employees e2 INNER JOIN LeaveRecords lr ON e2.empNum = lr.empNum INNER JOIN Leave l ON lr.leaveNum = l.leaveNum WHERE TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'MMDD') = #{leaveGrantDay})
